question_sentence: Where did the World Economic Forum take place this week?
evidence: The World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, brought global leaders together this week to discuss a range of economic, political and social issues.

question_sentence: The 2026 Oscar nominations were announced this week. Which film set the record for the most nominations for a single feature?
evidence: Ryan Coogler’s period vampire horror movie “Sinners” broke the record for most nominations for a single feature with 16, overcoming the past title holders “All About Eve,” “Titanic” and “La La Land,” which all had 14.

question_sentence: Which state is the latest target of the Trump administration’s expanded immigration crackdown?
evidence: Immigration and Customs Enforcement launched an operation in Maine on Wednesday as part of the Trump administration’s expanded immigration crackdown.

question_sentence: More than 125 million Americans received alerts this week due to which type of severe weather?
evidence: A major winter storm — one of the most extreme and widespread in years — is expected to deliver damaging ice and heavy snow to nearly half the US.

question_sentence: What did second lady Usha Vance announce this week?
evidence: Second lady Usha Vance and Vice President JD Vance are expecting a baby boy this summer, the couple announced Tuesday.

question_sentence: Which country was recently rocked by two train disasters?
evidence: Spain is reeling from two deadly rail crashes that occurred just days apart. Both incidents remain under investigation.

question_sentence: What happened in space this week?
choices: Stars formed a rare constellation pattern
Sun released a large solar radiation storm
evidence: The sun released the largest solar radiation storm in over 20 years, forecasters say. It produced dazzling auroras that were visible in multiple countries.

question_sentence: What is the name of the aircraft that made commercial supersonic travel a reality 50 years ago?
evidence: Pilots who took the controls of the Concorde say it was like no other airplane. They recently shared with CNN what it was like to fly the world's fastest commercial passenger aircraft, which cruised at more than twice the speed of sound.

question_sentence: Which country issued safety warnings after four shark attacks this week?
evidence: A spate of shark attacks in Australia's most populous state has triggered warnings to stay out of the water.

question_sentence: Which university won the college football national championship for the first time in school history?
evidence: The Indiana Hoosiers are college football's national champions for the first time in school history after defeating the Miami Hurricanes 27-21.
